pr_title: [IOTDB-624]Fix a Last cache bug when WAL is disabled

timeline.message: Fix a Last cache bug when WAL is disabled

timeline.bodyText: Reset to true in the end
timeline.author: qiaojialin

timeline.bodyText: Do not use testInsertRecord, use insertRecord
timeline.author: qiaojialin

timeline.bodyText: do not use testInsertTablet, use insertTablet
timeline.author: qiaojialin

timeline.bodyText:
this table does not have any data, it will not be sent to the server.
Look the SessionExample to see the use of Tablet
timeline.author: qiaojialin

timeline.message: use insertRecord and insertTablet in test cases
